thread.title: What Songs Did You Never Realise Were Actually About Sex
thread.title_full: What Songs Did You Never Realise Were Actually About Sex

author: Tahlia Pritchard
title: What Songs Did You Never Realise Were Actually About Sex
text:
View this image ›
NBC ID: 10295106 2. Yep. I’m talking about songs that are actually about doing the sex. View this image ›
E! ID: 10295112 3. Whether it’s an old song that didn’t click until you were way older … View this image ›
Virgin Records ID: 10295108 4. …or a recently released one that took you a few listens before you realised… Now that I know Side to Side is about bomb sex making it hard to walk, I like it way more. @ArianaGrande yes queen
— Bethany △⃒⃘ (@sassyxspice) ID: 10295111 5. …well, we’ve been there. Oh, that song is about sex?!? I thought it was about dodging something by "moving side to side". I never get sex stuff.
— craigtrolli (@craigtrolli) ID: 10295115 6. So ‘fess up. What song did you not instantly realise was about sex? View this image ›
YouTube: TLCVEVO ID: 10295116 7. Comment below for the chance to be featured in an upcoming BuzzFeed Community post! ID: 10295117
